attributes.action: Restrict HGV's to the inside lane on dual carriage ways and motorways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To restrict HGV's to the inside lane between the hours of 9am and 6pm monday to friday. This works at the moment in most parts of euroupe and there does not seem to be any problems with it.you dont seem to get the bottle necks we do when a HGV pulls out and everybody has to slow down.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
